title: Thomas - British Military Soldier Voice Pack
description: 1350 files of +1100 unique phrases of a British male SOLDIER (or assassin, sniper, hacker) for Military, FPS, RTS, Survival, Action, Sci-fi games etc. Includes 2 Ver: Original and Radio (2700 files).
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Audio Preview: Original | Radio ||| List of Phrases


This pack is part of our Military Soldiers Bundle and Ultimate Military Bundle!


This BRITISH MALE SOLDIER voice pack, spoken by a native British voice actor, covers everything you need for your next project.

He can also be used as a Sniper, Assassin, Hacker, Marine, Captain, Hero, NPC character, etc.

It includes 2 versions: Original and Radio (2700 files TOTAL!), so you can use them as they are or apply any effect you desire to the original files.

The pack can be used for games such as: Military, FPS, RTS, Survival, Shooter, MOBA, Sci-Fi, Action-Adventure, Apocalyptic, Horror, simulation, Sandbox, RPG and more.

It can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 1350 files (2700 with effects) of +1100 unique phrases.
  • Native British/English accent.
  • Includes 2 versions: Original and Radio.
  • The pack is divided by categories for easy access.
  • Top quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


CATEGORIES:


  • Positive-Confirm
  • Negative-Refuse
  • Can't
  • Greetings
  • Goodbyes
  • Single Word
  • Questions
  • Direction
  • Trading
  • Phrases
  • Threats-Warning
  • Foul Language
  • Waiting For Orders
  • Target-Mission
  • Checking Area
  • Commands
  • Attacking
  • Under Attack
  • Requesting Help
  • Offering Help
  • Success
  • Shooter-Sniper
  • Hacker
  • Resources
  • Numbers
  • Time
  • Ranks
  • Weapons
  • Vehicles
  • Vocal Sounds
